meta.siteDescription: Professional metal processing - robotic welding, CNC laser cutting, powder coating, hydraulic press
meta.keywords: welding, robotic welding, laser cutting, CNC laser, powder coating, hydraulic press, metal processing, gates, fences, stairs, balustrades

home.title: Home
home.welcome: TEI - gates, fences, stairs, balustrades and metal elements
home.description: For years we have been manufacturing metal elements used in industry, agriculture and households
home.experienceYears: 25 years of experience in metal processing
home.aboutText: Our offer is very extensive. We make almost anything that can be made from metal - from accessories for agricultural machinery, through enclosures for electric and gas meters, to roof structures, gates, fences, stairs and furniture.
home.qualityText: We constantly improve the quality of our products through investments in specialized metal processing equipment.
home.gardenMachineryDesc: Accessories for tillers, garden machinery and agricultural equipment.
home.furnitureDesc: Metal furniture for industrial and residential applications.
home.customProjectsDesc: Custom projects according to client specifications.
home.residentialElementsDesc: Enclosures for electric and gas meters and structures for residential complexes.
home.gatesDesc: Production of gates, fences, stairs and balustrades made from high-quality steel.
home.roofStructuresDesc: Fabrication of roof structures and other structural elements.
home.roboticWeldingDesc: Precise welding using modern robotic welding systems.
home.laserCuttingDesc: Laser cutter with 3D module for precise cutting of sheets and profiles.
home.powderCoatingDesc: Durable and aesthetic powder coating resistant to weather conditions.
home.hydraulicPressDesc: Processing and forming of metal elements using a hydraulic press.
home.materialsIntro: We offer products made from various metals including:
home.ctaText: Contact us to discuss the details of your project
home.whyUsExperienceDesc: 25 years of experience allows us to recommend the best technical and technological solutions for your project
home.whyUsQualityDesc: Products made from high-quality materials, built to last for years
home.whyUsMachineryDesc: Robotic welding, 3D CNC laser, powder coating - advanced technologies for precise results

funding.title: Funding

services.laserDesc: We have a modern laser cutter with a 3D module that enables very precise cutting of metal sheets. We offer hole cutting services in profiles.
services.powderDesc: We have a modern powder coating facility that allows us to obtain a durable, aesthetic and weather-resistant coating on painted elements.
services.weldingDesc: MIG/MAG/TIG welding and robotic welding. We weld black steel, stainless steel and aluminum.
services.pressDesc: We have a hydraulic press for processing and forming metal elements.
